EXTRACTED VALUE: Celtics GM Danny Ainge said this week that Kendrick Perkins will have to earn his starting job back once he returns from ACL surgery.
Nets guard Keyon Dooling was inactive on Monday because of a groin injury.
Jeff Teague had 10 points and six assists in 22 minutes on Wednesday.
Aaron Gray played 20 minutes off the Hornets bench on Saturday, posting seven points, 11 rebounds and two blocks.
Celtics selected Notre Dame PF Luke Harangody with the No. 52 pick in the draft.
Jordan Crawford dropped in 30 points while going 13-for-20 from the field, including three three-pointers, five rebounds and five assists.

Coach Doc Rivers said that Delonte West (fractured wrist) is in danger of missing the rest of the regular season.

Josh Howard (knee) has been cleared for full-contact drills and hopes to make his season debut during the second week of December.

O.J. Mayo hit just 1-of-5 shots for three points in 24 minutes off the bench on Friday.

Joel Anthony will start the Heat's first preseason game at center.

Anthony Parker is expected to be the starting shooting guard for the Cavs this season.

Darko Milicic 14 points on 6-of-12 shooting with nine rebounds, three assists, and three blocks on Saturday.
